content: & more group on facebook so if you already have enough individual designer groups on your plate and you re not already a member come join the fun there https //www facebook com/groups/mosaiccrochet/ ref=share you ll find lots of information and inspiration from a huge variety of designers and makers from all over the world and last but not least thread is my favorite medium these days especially in the hotter months so if thread is also a favorite of yours or you re simply curious come check it out my thread crochet group https //www facebook com/groups/112121635945127/ ref=share happy looking & hooking ❤️r
